name: 1.0.0.alpha#1288
body: Changes since 0.11.1262 (05.04.2016) This release focuses mostly on fixes. The most critical issues which were fixed in this release are auto-importing packages from unreachable `testdata` directories and resolving `cap` expressions. Also here are couple improvements which this release brings: ### Go vet tool `go vet` tool is built-in tool now and can be invoked on selected file or directory via `Code | Go Tools | Go vet` menu or via editor menu. ### Expression Type `Show info` action is reimplemented using built-in `Expression Type` action which is available by `Alt+=` (`Ctrl+Shift+P` on Mac) shortcut. Also it works now on variable/constant definitions. ### Autoscroll from source and Navigate in... features Since this release it's possible to use `Autoscroll form source` mode in `File structure` tool window for `go` sources. `Navigate to... | File Structure` action works now as well. # Changes For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/527f2bf...2c63b959). Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#1262
body: Changes since 0.11.1236 (28.03.2016) To install the plugin, visit the [readme](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds). This release focuses mostly on fixes and improvements. It contains fixes in resolution algorithms and in running tests mechanism. ## Read/Write access ### New inspections and quick fixes In this release, the part which is responsible for detecting read/write access to variables was completely rewritten. Based on this the new inspection `_ used as value inspection` is introduced and added new `Replace with ':='` quick fix for unresolved variables with write access. ### Improved inspections and quick fixes Also `Introduce constants` quick fix won't be suggested for unresolved variables with write access and `Cannot assign to constant` catches more cases now. ### Find usages grouping Grouping by read/write access in find usages works more accurate as well. ## Run configurations Now you can see real `GOROOT` and `GOPATH` values which are used during compilation and running your application. Also, now there is an easy way to restart run configuration after compilation error. # Changes For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/af33ebb...527f2bf). Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#1236
body:
Changes since 0.10.1137 (11.02.2016)

This release introduces compatibility with IDEA 2016.1 and long-expected vendoring experiment support.

To install the plugin, visit the [readme](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds).

# Changes

First of all, the plugin now supports IDEA 2016.1 and all IDEs based on this release version.

Also, this is the last update compatible to IDEA 14.1 and all IDEs based on 141.\* builds.

### Vendoring

With the new version the plugin now supports the Go 1.5 Vendoring Experiment. This means that all imports from vendored packages will be resolved properly. Auto-import quick fix and package completion are also working corresponding to vendoring experiment rules now. Moreover, completion lists are less polluted since the symbols defined in unreachable vendored packages are excluded.

### Internal Packages

Internal package are supported in the same way as vendoring. The special inspection now highlights invalid usages of internal package and unreachable internal packages are filtered out from completion list.

### Rerun Failed Tests

Another new feature is the ability to **Rerun Failed Tests**: [![Rerun Failed Tests action](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/13855322/d638f11e-ec80-11e5-9a24-2110e3730e9e.png)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UDH4XMinjYk)

### Test function name completion and auto-import while generating tests

![complete_test_names](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/14091905/9630c1ae-f54b-11e5-9859-965f17ee3e1a.gif)

Besides the above changes, the release contains several bugfixes related to imports and resolution algorithm.

[A list of all changes](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/6a6ad4a4273f4875a97ed14eca358dfaf29a6e9b...c021f45efb6f)

Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#1137
body:
Changes since 0.10.1068 (25.01.2016)

This release focuses mostly on fixes and improvements.

To install the plugin, visit the [readme](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds).

# Changes

In this alpha release, we have to big features.

First of all thanks to @sjamesr now it's possible to run benchmarks right from the IDE:

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/13121445/5fb89054-d5c3-11e5-860d-07de706754b0.png)

And in the second, since Delve is available on Windows you can debug your applications on Windows in IDE (in plugin versions 0.10.\* and 0.11.*).

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/13144968/c0d088f6-d65e-11e5-9b78-7968ce84c3f4.png)

Also, we made some fixes in inspections, find usages and improved performance.

For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/02c39130d...6a6ad4a4273f4875a97ed14eca358dfaf29a6e9b).

Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#1068
body: Changes since 0.10.740 (20.11.2015) This release focuses mostly on fixes and improvements. To install the plugin, visit the [readme](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds). # Changes ## General IDEA 16 EAP support is introduced Go 1.6 SDK is supported ## Plan9 Thanks to @stuartcarnie now we have a syntax highlighting for Plan9 files ## Inspections & QuickFixes - Report a warning for exported variables and constants in multi-spec declarations and suggest to extract it ![exported_variable_should_have_own_declaration](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/12535333/382d169a-c290-11e5-8593-535a048f8fc2.gif) - Suggest to delete unused constants and variables ![delete_unused_variable_const](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/12535317/c161c5ce-c28f-11e5-81ea-7a7911b37d6d.gif) - Report a error on missing key in map literal - Report a error on not an expression function argument - Report a error on types used as expressions - Report a error about missing argument conversion - Highlight unused constants ## Other - Less polluted completion list: `iota` only inside constant declarations, deleted self-assignments and some keywords - Add more foldings for `if/else/for/switch/select` statements - Show constant value on Cltr+Hover - Various fixes of resolving, types inferring, quick documentation feature, formatting - Proper completion and resolving for break statements For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/273df35...02c39130d). Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#740
body: Changes since 0.9.550 (30.09.2015) This release focuses mostly on fixes and improvements. To install the plugin, visit the [readme](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds). # Changes ## Debugger - Inline Debugger - Better representation of arrays and slices in watches - Evaluate expressions on Alt+Click and Alt+F8 - Navigate to type sources from watches (Ctrl+F4) ![inline debugger](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/11431045/f5eb28ac-94a0-11e5-83bb-1b00f7419ea3.png) ![arrays and slices](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/11431053/0f8a69e4-94a1-11e5-9117-ee568e8de625.png) ## QuickDoc - supports indented blocks - shows links in documentation - shows links to type's documentation in function signature - able to open documentation at godoc.org via `External documentation` action - shows function signature on ctrl+hover ## Running - now it's possible to run Example-functions - coverage is running in `atomic` mode, so you can check coverage for test running with the `-race` flag ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/11431038/d932ece0-94a0-11e5-9cdb-cc9b78877965.png) ## Inspections - Validating StructTags. IDE will raise warnings if it detects a tag value that does not conform to the Go StructTag convention - Report a warning about defer inside loop - Report an error on continue outside loop - Report an error when using assignment instead of comparison in `if` statements ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/11431055/1df0dd56-94a1-11e5-8193-10d4ff0dd476.png) ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/11431059/256e11fc-94a1-11e5-9107-ea9ad61b81aa.png) ## Other - Highlight exit point for function you're staying on - Added configurable Go file template (File | Settings | Editor | File and Code Templates) ![highlight_exit_points](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/11431033/c761b3e8-94a0-11e5-914a-3b00ecd42384.gif) For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/386c52c11807...273df35). Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#550
body:
Changes since 0.9.518 (30.09.2015)

This release focuses mostly on fixes and improvements.

To install the plugin, visit the [readme](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds).

## Features and enhancements:
- Suppressions for package clause [#1896](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1896)

## Fixes
- False "unknown field" error [#1895](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1895)
- Fields in types defined as a named struct incorrectly show as unresolved [#1888](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1888)
- Unresolved reference [#1879](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1879)
- Fix a rare stack overflow [#1902](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1902)
- Unresolved reference on slices declared as types [#1846](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1846)
- Undefined variable is not reported [#1907](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1907)
- Unable to resolve variable in switch statement when using pointers [#1727](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1727)
- Private struct fields from other packages are showed in completion suggestion [#1899](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1899)
- time.Duration's method can not be completed automatically and can not go-to-define [#1911](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1911)
- Add word wrap while showing documentation [#1914](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1914)

For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/%23485...a012e6c75c8bf732c797512d5f16c5e088c872a9).

Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#518
body:
Changes since 0.9.485 (01.09.2015)

This release contains a lot of fixes and improvements.

To install the plugin, visit the [readme](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds).

## Features and enhancements:
- Improved highlighting of todos in multiple line comments [commit/d7e7b53f](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/d7e7b53f0cc3fc059717fd3d13ebc8fff3485f25)
- Improved formatter [commit/95e1ad4c](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/95e1ad4cf86179a37f0ad66e657f9492d4b90a9b)
- Delve: add an ability to show var/params and eval symbol for all stack frames, not for the topmost one [commit/a7c1e66b](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/a7c1e66b33942c6e152effe05caa31f198fc9a3f)
- Delve: now using version 0.9

## Fixes
- Better processing for pointer type inside ranges [#1837](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1837)
- Fix unused var inspection for lambdas [#1809](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1809)
- Fix introduce global type quick fix [commit/1134dbb](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/1134dbb42caa66981572a7bd3959a97fab12e375)
- Fix processing for map of pointers [#1723](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1723)
- Fix icon for failed tests [#1853](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1853)
- Fix for redeclared package import inspection [#1461](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1461)
- Fix incorrect type of an argument that is a function with named return values [#1869](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1869)
- Fix unresolved structure fields in initializer [#1877](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1877)

A number of other rare case exceptions where fixed.

[A list of all changes](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/%23485...1f0e6a2) in the plugin since the previous build.

Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#485
body:
Changes since 0.9.460 (18.08.2015)

This release brings the much requested integration with [delve](https://github.com/derekparker/delve), the Go debugger.

It is the first version of the integration so there might be a need to polish some rough edges here and there. If you find any such edge, please report it back to us with as much details as possible.

To get started on debugging with delve, you can read from our [wiki](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/wiki/Documentation#debugging-a-go-project).

To install the plugin, visit the [readme](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds)

## Features and enhancements:
- Support delve debugging [#1252](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1252)
- Support for renaming an import alias has been added [#1813](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1813) 
- A new inspection checks if the file self-imports the package it is in 

## Fixes
- Completion for missing keywords was added [#1808](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1808)
- Better variable shadowing support [#1752](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1752)
- `go vet` before launch is now properly working again [#1834](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1834)

For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/c2c0333...f93a5110c2).

Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#460
body: Changes since 0.9.402 (21.07.2015) This release brings further enhancements and small improvements to the plugin. The most notable change is the addition of "Introduce variable refactoring". This allows you to create new variables from values automatically. ## Features and enhancements: - Introduce variable refactoring [#1772](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1772) - Better new function template [#1979](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1797) - Autoimport packages on the fly. IDE will import packages you're using automatically while you typing if there is just a single package with given name - Completion improvements for func, interface and struct keywords [#1798](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1798) - New inspection that check nil assignments without explicit type (thanks to @azhidkov) - Added ability to exclude particular packages from autoimport and completion. Just take a look at the new configuration page at `Laguages & Frameworks | Go | Auto Import` or just press `Alt+Enter` on completion item #1382 ## Fixes - Wrong expression result count on builtin functions calls [#1696](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1760) - Unresolved method [#1739](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1739) - Specify relative directory for building [#1515](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1515) - Fix nil assignment inspection for short vars, constants declarations [#1785](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1785) - Reformatting code does not work correctly [#1795](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1795) For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/7c8b9bf...c2c03335). Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#402
body:
Changes since 0.9.371 (29.06.2015)

This release brings further improvements for working with large code bases and optimizes on speed and memory consumption

Structure view (ALT+7 on Linux) has received some updates, making it easier to quickly identify parts of the package, navigate in a package with multiple files and filter on various options.

There are also changes in the auto-import system and auto-detection of package names that should make the overall experience even better.

Finally, go 1.5 beta releases should now be correctly identified by the IDE and you can use them accordingly now.

Features and enhancements:
- Display struct methods as part of the struct in project structure view [#1712](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1712)
- Suggest package name as _test on _test.go files [#1715](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1715)
- Improve package name detection for new files [#1715]([#1715]%28https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1715%29)
- Find by symbol name now works when prefixing symbol with receiver name [#1428](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1428)
- Autoimport completion for variables and constants [#1346](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1346)
- A new inspection will check for cgo import in test files [#1725](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1725)
- Multiple packages in same directory inspection has been updated to include scratch files [#1734](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1734)

Fixes:
- Unused variable declared in a type switch is not reported [#1696](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1696)
- Identation in a case block is now better [#1399](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1399)
- Functions / methods from files for different platforms will not be considered as duplicates anymore [#1721](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1721)
- default is now supported for switch type code [#1741](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1741)
- Go 1.5 beta releases are now correctly identified by the IDE [#1753](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1753) (thank you [JessonChan](https://github.com/JessonChan))
- Auto-complete shouldn't suggests test file content outside test files [1742](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1742)

A big thank you goes to [Eugene Auduchinok](https://github.com/eugene-auduchinok) for the nice contributions he made to the plugin.

For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/3c9dd2a...7c8b9bf).

Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#371
body:
**Changes since 0.9.346 (09.06.2015)**

This release brings support for gocheck testing framework. Big thanks to [Maxim Vladimirskiy (@horkhe)](https://github.com/horkhe) for this contribution.

Initial support for IDEA 15 EAP is present (if you find something that's broken please let us know).

Structure view support has been updated to support displaying the contents from the current file or from the current package.

Improvements of Google App Engine support: more flexible run configurations and properly symbol resolution depending on yaml files locations.

Features and enhancements:
- gocheck testing framework is now supported (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/988)
- more consistent file names for scratch files (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1652)
- structure view now supports displaying all the package elements or only the current file elements (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1595)
- add duration reporting in tests (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1703)
- support Fedora-specific SDK layout
- support Go SDK for RC releases (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1707)
- GAE: allow to specify admin port in run configurations
- GAE: allow to specify target yaml configuration file
- GAE: resolve imports relatively to app.yaml (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1525)
- Make label highlighting colors configurable (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1693)

Fixes:
- quick documentation now show the channel arrows properly (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1686)
- parameters for closure function calls are now properly displayed (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1687)
- go fmt is now properly run before git commit when commiting from the IDE (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1633)
- better parsing of switch statement (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1409)
- better support project without project-level Go SDK (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1605)

As usual, this release has a more small fixes and improvements.

For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/346...3c9dd2a).

Develop with pleasure!

name: 1.0.0.alpha#346
body:
**Changes since 0.9.325 (13.05.2015)**

This release brings changes to the building process as well as completion support by improving the support for various build flags and not only. These settings can be found here under `Settings | Languages & Frameworks | Go`.
Also major speedups for large files should be noticed when highlighting them. Also, the completion system has been improved (to take full advantage upgrade to IDEA 14.1.4, it's available in the latest EAP).

Features and enhancements:
- It's now possible to customize the target OS via the UI (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1590)
- SearchEverywhere should work now
- There is now an inspection to flag when you are using a builtin type name as a variable name. While it's perfectly valid as a go syntax and the plugin won't complain about that, it will complain about the names when this is enabled (it's on by default) due to the potential bugs it can cause. (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1450)
- It is now possible to specify where the go build should write the file that it generates when running with the Go Application configuration (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1658)
- Windows with go / compiled go programs output will now support rich formatting / highlighting (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1507)

Fixes:
- Completion update for custom slice types (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1627) 
- Better switch statement indentation (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1622)
- Better stack trace dumps analyzing filter (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1617)
- More completion fixes (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1655)
- More auto-indentation fixes (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1628)
- GOPATHs that look like GO SDK paths will now be ignored automatically (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/6599cfadc723efb45cb0bf4e7069e6ce70c3dae5)

For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/%23325...59f5195de7a4b6db579c06b432a3a14da6bcbf4e).

name: 1.0.0.alpha#325
body:
**Changes since 0.9.300 (30.04.2015)**

This release brings some much awaited features and enhancements as well as fixes the _outter_package/inner_package completion issue and various other completion system fixes.

Also a host various performance fixes are in place. If you encounter scenarios where performance is sluggish, please open [a new ticket](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/new). Sample code that helps us reproducing issues is always welcomed, and if you don't want to share it publicly, contact us on Gitter. CPU snapshots are valuable, you can [read how to create them](https://intellij-support.jetbrains.com/entries/29983118-Reporting-performance-problems).

**Features and enhancements:**
- Duplicate method inspection was added (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1578)
- Processing of +build tags (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1597)
- Support for OS build target was added (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/3b8430e30f79a28e93676baf853024b55a699728) (for now it's usable from the command line only, UI support will be added later)
- $GOPATH/bin and $GOPATH/bin are automatically added at the execution time for various tools and your app (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/935919824f8ff7b3b589c35ba5b0f640fb6d09ea) ($GOPATH -> Idea Go SDK dir, $GOPATH -> your libraries path)
- Rename to blank quick fix was added (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/f3879f42ff40915cb3120fa082c1f6fe21c841bf)
- Analyze stacktrace functionality is now supported. To access it use `Analyze | Analyze Stacktrace` (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1615)
- System GOPATH can now be removed from the default Go libraries (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1618)

**Fixes:**
- It is possible to add the Go tip SDK again (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/pull/1602)
- Competion suggestions when skipping to the next line (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1582)
- Return inspection now properly supports the "fallthrough" statement (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/e61c7d3e9e2c5982f0e588541b9470c39c8b4d32)
- Added some missing builtin keywords to the completion service (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1581)
- Completion in _test files works better (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1454)
- Better Test/Benchmark function detection (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/0567fa517f70178bd6f0ed5f4a5852226048610f)
- os.Getenv("GOPATH") when running the application from inside the IDE should be properly set now (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1600)
- Unused function detection now properly detects "_" named functions (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/ff66a9058a4150da86cd3f88f788855405cece87)
- Fixed completion for chained functions with single named return parameter (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1605)
- Fixed unresolved reference in nested functions with multiple parameters (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1607)

Thank you [@linniksa](https://github.com/linniksa) for various contributions to the plugin.

For a list of all changes in the plugin, you can visit [this page](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/%23291... 2cd8f79d8da490b5e468c397ca3ab005d2079296).

name: 1.0.0.alpha#291
body:
**Changes since 04.04.2015**
A lot of performance enhancements for various scenarios were included in this release. If you encounter scenarios where performance is sluggish, please open [a new ticket](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/new). Sample code that helps us reproducing issues is always welcomed, and if you don't want to share it publicly, contact us on Gitter. CPU snapshots are valuable, you can [read how to create them](https://intellij-support.jetbrains.com/entries/29983118-Reporting-performance-problems).

**Important** 
Package nightly and alpha channels links are now updated. Please remember to update the links in your IDE as well. You can get the links for the new channels from the [pre release builds](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds) paragraph.

**Features and enhancements**:
- added the ability to create and execute Go [scratch files](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/help/scratches.html) (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1544)
- default encoding for .go files is now UTF-8 and it cannot be changed by mistake anymore (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1537)
- a new quick fix is available to convert unused variables to _ (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1337)
- multi-line commenting continuation is now supported for single line comment markers (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1462)
- code in 'testdata', '_package_name' and '.package_name' is not offered for completion anymore (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1490)
- packages are now displayed in relation to their proximity to their current package in the autocompletion options for package importing (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1433)
- console output will now display a link for absolute file paths (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/commit/34e8650dcf3ec22382738a2d7cd8335908a03dc7)

**Fixes**:
- auto-importing packages won't duplicate existing package imports anymore (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1511)
- improved support for resolving when pointer arguments / casts are present (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1527 https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1523)
- better support for multi-line function arguments (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1311)
- fixed parsing issues with literal maps (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1532)
- passing functions definitions as parameters is handled correctly again (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1535)
- private funcs / structs are not displayed anymore in completion for _test packages (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1560)
- highlight usages of imported package when cursor is on import definition (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1547)
- executing goimports works once again (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1538)
- some fixes where applied to the formatting engine (https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/473)
- minor fixes

For a full list of changes, see https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/compare/a41c1f15388e09cfbd3bc2ffad624a9072c8ee82...856b9a35c43ae773772222a724cad113f44b17e2

**Install instructions**
Visit https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds and read the paragraph in order to install the plugin in your favorite Jetbrains IDE.

name: We've moved away from Github releases
body:
Build [#201](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/releases/tag/%23201) was the last available from Github releases (but we are still active!)
We've moved away to using custom release channels for the plugin.
You can read more about this here: https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin#pre-release-builds

name: 1.0.0.alpha#201
body:
Alpha pre-release of the 1.0.0 version.
Doesn't contain all the functionality of the 0.9.x branch but has a completely reworked internals.
It's faster than 0.9.x, refactoring works to some degree and has native support for gopath packages.

You need to **install the zip file**, do not extract its contents. For more information, check the [README](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/tree/v1.0.0-alpha0#pre-release-builds)

To get you started using this version, read the following [wiki article](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/wiki/v1.0.0-Setup-initial-project) on how to setup a new project in your IDE.

Building Go apps using any option from `Buld` menu is currently not working, see [this comment](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues/1453#issuecomment-83133292) for the reason behind it.

## Compatibility

Plugin can be installed on IntelliJ platform 139.1111 or greater. It corresponds to IntelliJ IDEA 14.0.3, WebStorm 9.0.3, PhpStorm 8.0.3 and future PyCharm 4.0.5.

## Release notes
- initial coverage support. See [demonstration](http://screencast.com/t/S2N0q9F7D) for details
- imports completion was reworked based on @linniksa's suggestion 
  ![screenshot 2015-03-18 12 37 30](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/6707913/eb47ebe4-cd6b-11e4-8698-403780d53cff.png)
- implemented package name completion
  ![screenshot 2015-03-18 12 36 58](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/140920/6707925/07d34330-cd6c-11e4-88c1-eee944dafb11.png)
- Indexing and completion speed improvements
- Various parser, completion, and symbol resolution bug fixes

[Details here](https://github.com/go-lang-plugin-org/go-lang-idea-plugin/issues?page=1&q=milestone%3A1.0.0+is%3Aclosed++closed%3A%3E2015-03-10)

name: 1.0.0.alpha#176
